column3: @ryanofsky Sorry if I've overlooked. Now with your suggestion.

Previous comment was actually correct, though for clarity I might change it to `// For CKeyID and CScriptID (definitions needed in CTxDestination instantiation`).\n\nNew comment is misleading because includes are only used here for things that can't be forward declared, and the only reason `CKeyID` and `CScriptID` can't be forward declared is because `CTxDestination` is instantiated as a struct
